attributes.action: We want a new MP and rid off Liz Truss
attributes.additional_details:
Liz Truss wants to cut peoples benefits even more and remove more of child cost payments and gonna let more people in the UK suffer when people already suffering.

We want Liz Truss out and a new MP to take over who will help people and not remove from the poor.

Get Liz Truss out before things get worser.
attributes.background: We want a new MP to take over and get rid of Liz Truss as a MP

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be removed.
